item.title: LookOnChain: Binance Alpha Launches FST
item.description: August 24th. Binance Alpha has launched FST.

item.title: CITIC Securities: The Trading Logic of a "Powell Put"-Driven Rally Will Lead the Next U.S. Stock Market
item.description: On August 24th, the research report of CICC Securities holds the view that Powell's speech at the Jackson Hole Symposium was in line with our previous anticipations. It is predicted that the Federal Reserve will reduce interest rates three times this year, with each reduction being 25 basis points. On the asset side, we believe that the main theme of the "interest rate cut trade" in the U.S. stock market will be redefined, and the "catch-up" trading logic will play a dominant role in the future U.S. stock market. Similar to the "interest rate cut trade" in July 2024, where asset classes sensitive to interest rates such as the Russell 2000, S&P 500 Real Estate, and NASDAQ Biotechnology witnessed a rise in prices, this situation may occur again.The market's expectation of the Fed's interest rate cuts this year still differs from our perspective. We anticipate that U.S. bond yields and the U.S. dollar index have a slight downward potential. For non-U.S. equities, Powell's dovish remarks

item.title: Aave Founder Responds Again to WLFI Protocol: WLFI Team Proposal Has Been Voted on by the Aave DAO and Has Received WLFI Approval
item.description: On August 24th, Stani.eth, the founder of Aave, once again posted on the X platform in response to the claim by the WLFI team that Aave will receive 7% of the total supply token. He stated, "The proposal created by the WLFI team has been voted on in the Aave DAO and has been approved" and "has received formal approval from WLFI."Previous reports indicated that according to Wu Shuo of the WLFI team, the claim "Aave will receive 7% of the total supply of WLFI tokens" is false news.

item.title: In the past 48 hours, 200,000 ETH was withdrawn from the exchange platform.
item.description: On August 24th, cryptocurrency analyst @ali_charts disclosed on-chain data indicating that 200,000 ETH had been withdrawn from exchanges within the past 48 hours.

item.title: The probability of a Fed rate cut in September has dropped to 75%.
item.description: On August 24th, according to the "FedWatch Tool" of CME, there is a 75% chance (down from 84.7% yesterday) that the Fed will cut rates by 25 basis points in September, and a 25% chance of keeping rates unchanged.

item.title: WLFI Pre-market Price Drops Over 45% in Nearly 20 Hours, Currently Trading at $0.238
item.description: On August 24th, according to HTX market data, the pre-market trading price of WLFI (World Liberty Financial) continued to decline and dropped below $0.24. It is currently trading at $0.238, with a continuous drop of more than 45% in nearly 20 hours.According to Coinglass data, the total open interest of WLFI futures contracts is currently $1.93 billion, and the 24-hour trading volume is $19.4 billion. The current global aggregated long/short ratio is 0.9474.BlockBeats previously reported that the Trump family project World Liberty Finance (WLFI) is scheduled to be launched on Ethereum on September 1st, with open claiming and trading. Early supporters (at $0.015 and $0.05 rounds) will unlock 20%, and the remaining 80% will be determined by community vote. Tokens for the founding team, advisors, and partners will not unlock. Trading will start at 8:00 PM on September 1st Beijing time, and the 20% token claiming will begin.

item.title: OKX Adjusts WLFIUSDT Perpetual Contract Gradient Tier Rule
item.description: On August 24th, according to an official announcement, OKX will make adjustments to the WLFIUSDT perpetual contract gradient tier rule on August 24, 2025, from 4:00 PM to 10:00 PM (UTC+8) in order to further enhance market liquidity.

item.title: The BTC network's daily transaction fee has recently dropped to around 4.09 BTC, marking the lowest coin-based level since late 2011.
item.description: On August 24th, based on Glassnode data, the daily transaction fee on the BTC network has recently plummeted to approximately 4.09 BTC, reaching the lowest level denominated in coins since late 2011.

item.title: Hut 8 Mining Corp Updates Equity Sales Plan, Aims to Raise $1 Billion
item.description: On August 24th, Hut 8 Corp., a publicly traded Bitcoin mining company in the US, refreshed its At-The-Market (ATM) equity program. The goal is to raise up to $1 billion through stock sales. This new plan supersedes Hut 8's previous $500 million ATM program, which was set to expire in December 2024. Earlier in this week, the company started construction on a $2.5 billion artificial intelligence data center in West Feliciana Parish, Louisiana.

item.title: Binance Copy Trading Launches Customizable Copy Mode Size
item.description: On August 24th, as per official information, Binance Futures copy trading users are now able to customize their copy trading position mode. The new features encompass:- Only replicate when the entry price is more favorable;- Replicate all existing positions;- Only replicate new positions.This update is being progressively rolled out on the website and app and will be fully implemented in the coming days.
